THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE.

images.caption: AMBER RUDD Hastings and Rye STANDING WITH THERESA MAY

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on contrasting Conservative leadership with the prospect of a Jeremy Corbyn-led government. It emphasizes risks associated with the Labour Party and aligns Amber Rudd with Theresa May.
